attributes.action: Make action against Israel or at least provide help towards Palestine
attributes.additional_details: Make action towards israel like show that we aint with you as they are showing in justice
attributes.background: Help Palestine for an example send food packages or send money

rejection.details:
On Wednesday 20 May the Government announced a UK aid package to help provide emergency relief for civilians in Gaza: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-aid-package-to-help-provide-emergency-relief-for-civilians-in-gaza--2

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Condemn Israel for their treatment of Palestine and Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585309

Introduce sanctions against Israel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585314

Sanction Israeli individuals and businesses over treatment of Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585845

UK Government to formally recognise the State of Palestine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585313
